metadata.title: CVE-2016-7393 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the aac_sync function in aac_parser.c inLibav before 11.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
